trans-unit.source: Represents a single touch input produced by a finger on a touchscreen.
trans-unit.target: 表示觸控螢幕上手指所產生的單一觸控輸入。

trans-unit.source: You typically access a <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice> by using the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchEventArgs.TouchDevice%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 您通常存取<xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice>使用<xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchEventArgs.TouchDevice%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice> represents a single touch on a screen.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice>代表單一的觸控式螢幕上。

trans-unit.source: If multiple touches are present, use the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice.Id%2A> property to distinguish between them.
trans-unit.target: 如果有多個工作，請使用<xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice.Id%2A>屬性來加以區分。

trans-unit.source: This class contains an inheritance demand at the class level that applies to all members.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別包含在類別層級套用至所有成員的繼承要求。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Security.SecurityException> is thrown when the derived class does not have full-trust permission.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Security.SecurityException>衍生的類別並沒有完全信任權限時，會擲回。

trans-unit.source: For more information about security demands, see [Link Demands](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md) and [Inheritance Demands](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/28b9adbb-8f08-4f10-b856-dbf59eb932d9).
trans-unit.target: 如需安全性需求的詳細資訊，請參閱[連結要求](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md)和[繼承要求](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/28b9adbb-8f08-4f10-b856-dbf59eb932d9)。

trans-unit.source: The following example enables you to create simple patterns on a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Canvas> by dragging two fingers on a touchscreen.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例可讓您建立簡單的模式上<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Canvas>觸控螢幕上拖曳兩隻手指放。

trans-unit.source: Each touch is represented by a <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice> in the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: 每個觸控由<xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice>中<xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchEventArgs>。

trans-unit.source: The pattern is created by drawing a line between the touch points that are provided by the touches.
trans-unit.target: 此模式會建立所提供的修飾觸控點之間繪製一條線。

trans-unit.source: This example requires a Windows Touch–compatible screen.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例需要 Windows 相容的觸控螢幕。

trans-unit.source: The following markup creates the user interface, which consists of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Canvas> that is centered in a grid, and attaches the event handlers for the touch events.
trans-unit.target: 下列標記會建立使用者介面，其中包含<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Canvas>，置中於方格中，並附加觸控事件的事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: The following code handles the touch events.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼會處理觸控事件。

trans-unit.source: When a touch is pressed on the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Canvas>, the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice> is captured to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Canvas>.
trans-unit.target: 當按下觸控<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Canvas>、<xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice>擷取至<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Canvas>。

trans-unit.source: When the touch is lifted, the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice> is released.
trans-unit.target: 當已消除觸控時，<xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice>釋放。

trans-unit.source: When a touch moves on the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Canvas>, the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice.Id%2A> is checked.
trans-unit.target: 的觸控式移動時<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Canvas>、<xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice.Id%2A>已核取。

trans-unit.source: If the move came from the first touch, its location is recorded.
trans-unit.target: 如果移動來自第一個觸控，會記錄其位置。

trans-unit.source: If the move came from the second touch, a line is drawn from the position of the first touch to the position of the second touch.
trans-unit.target: 如果移動來自第二個觸控，就會從第一個觸控位置一條線繪製位置的第二個觸控。

trans-unit.source: for deriving from this class.
trans-unit.target: 衍生自這個類別。

trans-unit.source: Security action: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />.
trans-unit.target: 安全性動作： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted" />
trans-unit.target: 相關聯的列舉型別： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted" />

trans-unit.source: A unique identifier for the touch device.
trans-unit.target: 觸控裝置的唯一識別項。

trans-unit.source: Called from constructors in derived classes to initialize the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 從衍生類別中的建構函式呼叫，以將 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice" /> 類別初始化。

trans-unit.source: requires full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 需要完全信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法供部分信任或安全性透明程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Adds the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice" /> to the input messaging system.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice" /> 加入至輸入訊息系統。

trans-unit.source: Classes that inherit from <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice> should call this method to activate the current device.
trans-unit.target: 類別繼承自<xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice>應該呼叫這個方法，以啟動目前的裝置。

trans-unit.source: The device is already activated.
trans-unit.target: 裝置已經啟動。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice" /> is added to the input messaging system.
trans-unit.target: 發生於當 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice" /> 加入至輸入郵件系統時。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.PresentationSource" /> that is reporting input for this device.
trans-unit.target: 取得報告這個裝置之輸入的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.PresentationSource" />。

trans-unit.source: The source that is reporting input for this device.
trans-unit.target: 報告這個裝置之輸入的來源。

trans-unit.source: Captures a touch to the specified element.
trans-unit.target: 擷取對指定之項目的觸控。

trans-unit.source: The element that captures the touch input.
trans-unit.target: 用於擷取觸控輸入的項目。

trans-unit.source: Captures a touch to the specified element by using the <see cref="F:System.Windows.Input.CaptureMode.Element" /> capture mode.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Input.CaptureMode.Element" /> 擷取模式，擷取對指定之項目的觸控。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the element was able to capture the touch; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果項目可以擷取觸控則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice> cannot be captured to an element if it is already captured to another element.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice>無法擷取的項目中，如果已擷取到另一個項目。

trans-unit.source: The following example handles the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TouchDown> events that occur on a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Canvas>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會處理<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TouchDown>所發生的事件<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Canvas>。

trans-unit.source: When a touch is pressed on the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Canvas>, the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice> is captured to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Canvas>.
trans-unit.target: 當按下觸控<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Canvas>、<xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice>擷取至<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Canvas>。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example that is available in the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例是所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice>類別概觀。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="element" /> is not a <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" />, <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement3D" />, or <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="element" /> 不是 <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" />、<see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement3D" />，也不是 <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" />。

trans-unit.source: The element that captures the touch.
trans-unit.target: 用於擷取觸控的項目。

trans-unit.source: The capture policy to use.
trans-unit.target: 要使用的捕捉原則。

trans-unit.source: Captures a touch to the specified element by using the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.CaptureMode" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.CaptureMode" /> 擷取對指定之項目的觸控。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the element was able to capture the touch; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果項目可以擷取觸控則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice> cannot be captured to an element if it is already captured to another element.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice>無法擷取的項目中，如果已擷取到另一個項目。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="element" /> is not a <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" />, <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement3D" />, or <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="element" /> 不是 <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" />、<see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement3D" />，也不是 <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the element that captured the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得擷取到 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice" /> 的項目。

trans-unit.source: The element that captured the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice" />.
trans-unit.target: 擷取到 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice" /> 的項目。

trans-unit.source: The following example handles the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TouchUp> events that occur on a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Canvas>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會處理<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TouchUp>所發生的事件<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Canvas>。

trans-unit.source: It checks the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice.Captured%2A> property to verify that the device that raised the event is captured to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Canvas>.
trans-unit.target: 它會檢查<xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice.Captured%2A>屬性，確認裝置引發事件會擷取至<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Canvas>。

trans-unit.source: If it is, the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice> is released.
trans-unit.target: 如果是，<xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice>釋放。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example that is available in the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例是所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice>類別概觀。

trans-unit.source: Gets the capture policy of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice" /> 的擷取原則。

trans-unit.source: The capture policy of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice" /> 的擷取原則。

trans-unit.source: Removes the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice" /> from the input messaging system.
trans-unit.target: 從輸入訊息系統中移除 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice" />。

trans-unit.source: Classes that inherit from <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice> should call this method to deactivate the current device.
trans-unit.target: 類別繼承自<xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice>應該呼叫這個方法，以停用目前的裝置。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TouchLeave> event is raised without the corresponding <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TouchUp> event.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TouchLeave>就會引發事件，而不對應<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TouchUp>事件。

trans-unit.source: The device is not activated.
trans-unit.target: 裝置尚未啟動。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice" /> is removed from the input messaging system.
trans-unit.target: 會在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice" /> 從輸入訊息系統移除時發生。

trans-unit.source: Gets the element that the touch contact point is directly over.
trans-unit.target: 取得觸控點壓到的項目。

trans-unit.source: The element that the touch contact point is directly over.
trans-unit.target: 觸控點壓到的項目。

trans-unit.source: The element that defines the coordinate space.
trans-unit.target: 會定義座標空間的項目。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, returns all touch points that are collected between the most recent and previous touch events.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中遭覆寫時，傳回最後兩次觸控事件期間收集到的所有觸控點。

trans-unit.source: All touch points that were collected between the most recent and previous touch events.
trans-unit.target: 最後兩次觸控事件期間收集到的所有觸控點。

trans-unit.source: The element that defines the coordinate space.
trans-unit.target: 會定義座標空間的項目。

trans-unit.source: Returns the current position of the touch device relative to the specified element.
trans-unit.target: 傳回目前觸控裝置相對於指定之項目的位置。

trans-unit.source: The current position of the touch device relative to the specified element.
trans-unit.target: 目前觸控裝置相對於指定之項目的位置。

trans-unit.source: Gets the unique identifier of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice" />, as provided by the operating system.
trans-unit.target: 取得作業系統所提供之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice" /> 的唯一識別項。

trans-unit.source: The unique identifier of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice" /> 的唯一識別項。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice> represents a single touch on a screen.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice>代表單一的觸控式螢幕上。

trans-unit.source: If multiple touches are present, use the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice.Id%2A> property to distinguish between them.
trans-unit.target: 如果有多個工作，請使用<xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice.Id%2A>屬性來加以區分。

trans-unit.source: The following example handles the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TouchMove> events that occur on a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Canvas>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會處理<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TouchMove>所發生的事件<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Canvas>。

trans-unit.source: When a touch moves on the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Canvas>, the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice.Id%2A> is checked.
trans-unit.target: 的觸控式移動時<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Canvas>、<xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice.Id%2A>已核取。

trans-unit.source: If the move came from the first touch, its location is recorded.
trans-unit.target: 如果移動來自第一個觸控，會記錄其位置。

trans-unit.source: If the move came from the second touch, a line is drawn from the position of the first touch to the position of the second touch.
trans-unit.target: 如果移動來自第二個觸控，就會從第一個觸控位置一條線繪製位置的第二個觸控。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example available in the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice>類別概觀。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the device is active.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，這個值表示裝置是否在使用中。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the device is active; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果裝置在使用中則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The element that captures the touch input.
trans-unit.target: 用於擷取觸控輸入的項目。

trans-unit.source: The capture policy.
trans-unit.target: 擷取原則。

trans-unit.source: Called when a touch is captured to an element.
trans-unit.target: 當擷取到對項目的觸控時呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice.OnCapture%2A> method has no default implementation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice.OnCapture%2A>方法有預設的實作。

trans-unit.source: It can be overridden in a derived class to perform any actions that are required when the touch input is captured.
trans-unit.target: 您可以執行擷取觸控輸入時，不需要任何動作的衍生類別中覆寫。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to cancel the action; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示取消動作，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Called when a manipulation has ended.
trans-unit.target: 當操作結束後呼叫。

trans-unit.source: Called when a manipulation is started.
trans-unit.target: 當操作開始時呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice.OnManipulationStarted%2A> method has no default implementation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice.OnManipulationStarted%2A>方法有預設的實作。

trans-unit.source: It can be overridden in a derived class to perform any actions that are required when touch manipulation is started.
trans-unit.target: 您可以在執行時啟動觸控操作時，不需要任何動作的衍生類別中覆寫。

trans-unit.source: Reports that a touch is pressed on an element.
trans-unit.target: 報告已在項目上按下觸控。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.TouchDown" /> event was handled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.TouchDown" /> 事件已處理則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Classes that inherit from <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice> should call this method to raise the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TouchDown> event.
trans-unit.target: 類別繼承自<xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice>應該呼叫這個方法，引發<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TouchDown>事件。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TouchEnter> event is raised before the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TouchDown> event.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TouchEnter>之前引發事件<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TouchDown>事件。

trans-unit.source: Reports that a touch is moving across an element.
trans-unit.target: 報告觸控正在移動經過項目。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.TouchMove" /> event was handled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.TouchMove" /> 事件已處理則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Classes that inherit from <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice> should call this method to raise the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TouchMove> event.
trans-unit.target: 類別繼承自<xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice>應該呼叫這個方法，引發<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TouchMove>事件。

trans-unit.source: Reports that a touch was lifted from an element.
trans-unit.target: 報告已在項目上放開觸控。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.TouchUp" /> event was handled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.TouchUp" /> 事件已處理則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Classes that inherit from <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice> should call this method to raise the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TouchUp> event.
trans-unit.target: 類別繼承自<xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice>應該呼叫這個方法，引發<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TouchUp>事件。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TouchLeave> event is raised after the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TouchUp> event.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TouchLeave>之後引發事件<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TouchUp>事件。

trans-unit.source: The source that reports input for this device.
trans-unit.target: 用來報告這個裝置之輸入的來源。

trans-unit.source: Sets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.PresentationSource" /> that is reporting input for this device.
trans-unit.target: 設定報告這個裝置之輸入的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.PresentationSource" />。

trans-unit.source: Forces the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice" /> to synchronize the user interface with underlying touch points.
trans-unit.target: 強制 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice" /> 同步處理使用者介面與基礎觸控點。

trans-unit.source: Synchronizing the user interface with the underlying touch positions might cause <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TouchMove> events to be raised.
trans-unit.target: 使用基礎觸控位置同步處理使用者介面可能會導致<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TouchMove>引發的事件。

trans-unit.source: The element to use as the frame of reference for calculating the position of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.IManipulator" />.
trans-unit.target: 計算 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.IManipulator" /> 的位置時，做為參考框架使用的項目。

trans-unit.source: Returns the position of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.IManipulator" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.IManipulator" /> 物件的位置。

trans-unit.source: The position of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.IManipulator" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.IManipulator" /> 物件的位置。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Input.IManipulator> interface.
trans-unit.target: 只有在 <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice> 執行個體轉換成 <xref:System.Windows.Input.IManipulator> 介面時，才能使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: Gets the unique identifier of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice" /> as provided by the operating system.
trans-unit.target: 取得作業系統所提供之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice" /> 的唯一識別項。

trans-unit.source: The unique identifier of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice" /> 的唯一識別項。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Input.IManipulator> interface.
trans-unit.target: 只有在 <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice> 執行個體轉換成 <xref:System.Windows.Input.IManipulator> 介面時，才能使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to cancel the action; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示取消動作，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a manipulation has ended.
trans-unit.target: 發生於操作已經結束時。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Input.IManipulator> interface.
trans-unit.target: 只有在 <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice> 執行個體轉換成 <xref:System.Windows.Input.IManipulator> 介面時，才能使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: Gets the element that receives input from the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得項目，這個項目會接收來自 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice" /> 的輸入。

trans-unit.source: The element that receives input from the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice" />.
trans-unit.target: 項目，會接收來自 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice" /> 的輸入。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a touch message is sent.
trans-unit.target: 發生於傳送觸控訊息時。
